it: GH-158: Using array index twice, breaks the template
bug reported by @fat where lambdas weren't being properly resolved
template:
This is a slightly more complicated {{thing}}.. {{! Just ignore this business. }} Check this out: {{#hasThings}}
    {{#things}}
  • {{word}}
    • {{/things}}
. {{/hasThings}} {{^hasThings}} Nothing to check out... {{/hasThings}}
expected:
This is a slightly more complicated blah.. Check this out:
  • @fat
  • @dhg
  • @sayrer
.
